name: ShipOrder
description:
Ships the specified order. When Lines are specified, only those lines will be shipped.

Shipping of Lines includes:
- Activating giftcards
- Mutating the stock of the products
- Potentially invoicing of the lines
- Validating requirements

properties.name: Force
properties.description:
Use with caution.
Set this to true if you want to skip requirements that would otherwise cause validation errors. Like shipping delivery lines, which you usually don't want from a shop.

properties.name: ShippedFromOrganizationUnitID
properties.description: The OrganizationUnit the shipment was physically shipped from.
